channel.title: Returning to RS
channel.description:
Where should I begin? I have almost no gear so I want to know some methods (not slow menial tasks like flax or easily annoying botted methods) in which to gain back around 40~m so I can get back to barrows/questing/making money off the kingdom.
I have 8.7m at the moment. here are my stats. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ikSXv.png[/img]
I'm buying membership someday soon, just wanna gather some information.

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:27, topic:447156”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=550056.msg4034936#msg4034936 date=1341108268]

[quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=550056.msg4034933#msg4034933 date=1341108116]

[quote author=mihalich link=topic=550056.msg4034914#msg4034914 date=1341106064]

I tried rejoining. Finished all the new F2P content then bought membership. After getting the new dragon defender within a half hour after, could not think of a single thing to do. Was bored af.

How about finishing all that p2p content?
[/quote]Forgot to mention I couldn’t really do anything due to constant dcs and lag.

Switch to direct x
[/quote]That helps? I always play on software.

It did for me I could barely run on min graphics and was getting around 10 fps i switched to direct x and run maxed details with bloom full screen and get like 30fps lol.
[/quote]Thank you! It runs incredibly smooth now. :D[/quote]
my client always crashes when i switch to directx

Read full topic

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Assholes post reminded me that I did my first elite clue today, it wasn’t that bad surprisingly took like 30mins but it was kinda intresting running about the place etc xD. only 205k loot though:(.

Btw if anyone here wants to do anything with me in Rs for fun/money w.e. just send me a pm :). Sorry a semi-spam post D:.

Read full topic

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

LilXCj:

Thanks for the tips guys. I know that runescape is repetitive but I was hoping you would mention anything that I could have fun doing. I’ll check up on my options the next time I’m on runescape.

I find clue scrolls are fun, but you might not.

I’m not sure how much profit they make anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Mitko:

Get 95 slayer and kill ganodermics.

That would take fecking ages lul.

Just play the game and watch gps role in though, people get to sidetracked on making gp. If your killing something that gives you a profit don’t neccasairly sell all of it. Maybe keep a lil bit of the lootage in the bank for later so you’ve got some wealth saved up. You’d be surprised how much gp you can save up like that

Read full topic

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:11, topic:447156”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=550056.msg4032587#msg4032587 date=1340916392]
The best you could do is bot fletching and get between 2x - 4x in profit.
[/quote]

Fletch maple longbows, it’s about a 300K profit for every 5K you do, considering you buy at average, and sell at average, or higher. You’ll make a couple million gp plus fletching levels.[/quote]

I know how well it makes money, it’s the reason I have 99 fletching.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth

The best you could do is bot fletching and get between 2x - 4x in profit.

item.title: Returning to RS
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Jmood:

So you don’t want a slow way to gain money, yet you don’t want a botting way… That pretty much brings your options to buying gp.

No, Farming at first is a slow way of making money but then you can make easy millions when higher level.
Merchanting and Flipping is also very good.

Read full topic
